title: N
clause_text: N.O.C. from Public Works Department and other related departments shall be obtained as per the prevailing rules. As regards service road / building line / control line, the Government Resolution, Public Works Department, No.RBD-1081/871/ Raste-7, dated 09 March, 2001 and the circulars issued in this regard from time to time shall be observed.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
